attributes.action: Open all pubs/clubs/restaurants and keep them open without curfews on 03/12/20
attributes.additional_details: The National Lock down is no good for anyone it is making people bored and depressed and people relationships with who they live with strained.  We need the National Lock-down to finish and never have anymore.  We need our pubs, restaurants and clubs and shops and all places open again and our vaccination released fast
attributes.background: Please can the government re-open all pubs and restaurants and clubs on 3 December 2020 without any curfews and also keep them open late on Christmas Eve and New Years Eve and have not more pubs curfews or National Shutdowns they are NOT working.  We need our vaccination now

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/325069
